alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Logan (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN CHAMPAIGN AND SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over St. Paris, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... St. Paris, West Liberty, North Lewisburg, Valley Hi, Rosewood, Pickrelltown, Lippincott, Carysville, Middleburg, Springhills, Kiser Lake State Park, Millerstown, Mingo, Kennard and East Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
